author: Stanley,Mr B
title: Sloan Kettering surgery
text:
My daughter had surgery early Friday morning last week. Thursday night we stayed at the hotel to get a an early start and 5 am.
The room was comfortable and it had a kitchenette. We were unsure if she would have to stay in the hospital Friday night so I booked a second night for me. I explained this when I reserved and they would waive the early cancellation requirement. She was released Friday so we were able to just pay for the one night. That was awesome?
Nathan and Kris at the desk confirmed what was told and offer to hold my luggage when my daughter was ready to go home. It was a great experience!
Room Tip: Quiet room on 6th floor. It was an accessible roomful my disabled daughter. Extra blankets and towel... See more room tips Green Features: Efficient led lighting. Water conservation. Efficient heating.
